name: perchance-generator

author: Vaibhav-Satishkumar

commands.name: index
commands.title: Generate Using Perchance
commands.description: Get the generated text using perchance by inputting the generator name. If a generator name isn't inputted, the default generator will be used.

preferences.name: project
preferences.title: Default Generator Name
preferences.description: When you don't enter the argument for the generator name, this will be the default generation. The way you can find the name of the generator is by looking at the endpoint of the perchance generator's url.
preferences.placeholder: Enter the name of the desired default generator name from perchance.
